overview:
Jesse Friedman is a serial entrepreneur, with a focus on the creative and business end of developing companies. Jesse Friedman primarily handles the brand marketing and development of new and existing businesses in addition to the creation and branding of his own ventures.

Cobbs Friedman is a marketing and advertising agency which he founded in 2005 to aid small businesses in branding and development with a focus on internet channels. A niche in real estate marketing aided in the development of Brokerage Leader, which primarily offers brokerages a complete online solution for generating and tracking leads. This eventually gave way to his current project, Diggsy.com, which aims to be the simplest and fastest Nationwide real estate search on the internet.
